overview: After shooting a man in self-defense, Buck Duane finds himself accused of many crimes, none of which he committed. In order to prove his innocence, he joins the Texas Rangers, and also hopes to win the approval and hand of Mary Aldridge, a girl from the East. He is assigned to round up a gang of cattle rustlers who are, unknown by Mary. led by her father.
tagline: A soul stirring pulse-beating action drama of the old Southwest...The double-barrelled romance of a dreamy girl and a delightful bandit.
title: The Lone Star Ranger
